 Double restricted universal quantification.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
statement:
r2alf.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
r2alf $p |- ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ph <-> A. x A. y ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> ph ) ) $.
$d x y $.
